pasteDropSelect: Attach files by dragging & dropping, selecting or pasting them.
confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this article?
sendNotificationTooltip: Send a notification to all subscribers of the selected tags
notificationBodyTooltip: The body text of the notification sent to subscribers. Try to keep this short and concise.
markdown_guide: This text is written in markdown. Click here for a cheat sheet.

warning.noSwedishHeader: You do not have a header in Swedish. Publish anyway?
warning.noEnglishHeader: You do not have a header in English. Publish anyway?
warning.noBody: You do not have a body. Publish anyway?
warning.missingBodyTranslation: You are missing translations for your body. Publish anyway?
warning.noNotificationText: You are sending notifications but don't have a notification text. Publish anyway?
warning.noTags: You do not have any tags on your article. Publish anyway?
warning.noTagsOnNotification: You are sending out notifications without any tags, no one will receive a notification. Publish anyway?
